data.text: @shannon_last Sohrab and Rusty who supposedly care about communitarianism, nationalism and the Highest Good willfully ignoring a deadly pandemic and then downplaying a bloody invasion of a sovereign country. It's always the people you least suspect... https://t.co/GmSc2Knypd

@FrMatthewLC @shannon_last Agree, this is an important clarification. But since the original post here is not evergreen but simply trolling nonsense, I think my explanation may be correct in this particular case... 😉
@q_professor @shannon_last At least right away. I will sometimes see a notification that someone liked a 2-year-old tweet that's evergreen, then RT it as it is still good, but lost by now.
@shannon_last Retweeting yourself is always a sign of desperation. 😅
@gabeschoenfeld No, he actually sneaked into a hospital with it, I think while he was also positive, so that he could then go mock everyone who didn’t want to get Covid as a coward afraid of death.
@shannon_last @allahpundit Cool that he retweeted his own tweet too.
@shannon_last I can never fail to be amazed at the takes of his own he deems worthy of retweeting.

@gabeschoenfeld @shannon_last Reno also called people who chose to wear masks early in the pandemic cowards on Twitter.  After the inevitable backlash to that Tweet he deleted his account and unless he is using a burner hasn’t gotten back on.
@shannon_last Sohrab continues to explore new depths.
@shannon_last All I remember about Rusty Reno and masks is that he picked up a filthy one from the gutter and put it on so he could board the Staten Island ferry.
